mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, bf.boardfile_id, bf.board_id, bf.boardfile_name, bf.boardfile_type, bf.boardfile_size FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN boardfile bf ON b.board_id = bf.board_id ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT b.board_id, b.board_title, b.board_content, bf.boardfile_id, bf.boardfile_name, bf.boardfile_type, bf.boardfile_size FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN boardfile bf ON b.board_id = bf.board_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent} WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
